# Kalshify

**Experience Kalshi prediction markets from anywhere in the world.**

---

AI-powered paper trading for Kalshi prediction markets. Practice trading worldwide — no US residency required.

## What We're Building

**[kalshify.vercel.app](https://kalshify.vercel.app)** — Paper trade Kalshi prediction markets globally

### Features

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Markets Explorer** | Browse live Kalshi markets with real-time data |
| **Paper Trading** | Buy YES/NO positions without real money |
| **P&L Tracking** | Track unrealized and realized profits |
| **AI Recommendations** | Claude-powered market suggestions |
| **Leaderboard** | Compete with traders worldwide |
| **Price Simulation** | Test scenarios before committing |

### Why Paper Trade?

- **Global Access** — Trade from anywhere, no US residency needed
- **Zero Risk** — Practice with simulated money
- **Real Data** — Live Kalshi market prices
- **AI-Powered** — Get personalized recommendations
- **Learn First** — Understand prediction markets before real trading

### Pages

- `/markets` — Browse all Kalshi markets
- `/markets/[ticker]` — Market detail with trading
- `/portfolio` — Your paper positions and P&L
- `/leaderboard` — Global rankings
- `/for-you` — AI recommendations

## Tech Stack

Next.js 16 · React 19 · TypeScript · Tailwind CSS · Claude AI · Vercel

## Disclaimer

Kalshify is an educational paper trading platform. No real money is involved. Not affiliated with Kalshi Inc.

## Connect

- **Website:** [kalshify.vercel.app](https://kalshify.vercel.app)
